data.message:
Dear friend! I ask your help for my friend Mikhail Lopatin , The diagnosis is poorly-differentiated squamous carcinoma (cancer). We still need to collect the remaining amount of 30.000 Euro for surgery. We will be thankful for any help! Share this link, it takes only second, but you will help to save one life!
https://www.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gofundme.com%2Fmikhail_lopatin%3Fpc%3Dfb_cr_g&h=pAQF6y0M8&s=1
